interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: VILLAGE11FACTORY Cica Cream, Centella Soothing and Repairing Cream for Dry and Irritated Skin, Moisturizer, Anti-Wrinkles, Lightweight, Relieves Irritated Skin, Fragrance Free, Dermatologically Tested, 1.69 fl oz 50ml
Review Date: 2020/06/26
Store: VILLAGE11FACTORY
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'VILLAGE11FACTORY', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'hyaluronic_acid', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 1.97 x 1.46 inches; 2.47 Ounces'}
Review Text: This Derma Clear B5 Cica Cream is not oily/greasy at all. It makes my skin feel incredibly hydrating and makes my skin so very soft. It’s unclear from the packaging if this product is specifically designed to use on your face or all over. I’ve used it on my hands, elbows, and on dry spots all over my body and was pleasantly surprised at how well it worked. I didn’t notice any scent when using the lotion. My only reason for taking a star away from the rating is because of the cost of this product. You only get 1.69 fluid ounces of product, so it’s not a great value. However, I do think the product is effective!
Review Title: Very moisturizing and soften skins
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Brush Strokes Large Ball Tip Rounder Brush (Assorted Colors) Brush Strokes {'Brand': 'Brush Strokes', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Special Feature': 'Not-applicable', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.8 x 2.6 x 2.6 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B004F0KBDW_US', 'UPC': '794168349933'} Pros: This brush is so light weight and makes it so easy to create a smooth, straight look with your hair. It does not tangle at all and is easy to use.
Cons: The brush made my hair a little flat, but I have thin, fine hair that requires work to create body. Great for smoothing and straightening hair! Cancun Collection Cacao Body Bronzer – Superfood Infused Sunless Tanning Lotion with Cacao 5.1 fl.oz, For Instant Tan in 1 minute. Cancun Collection {'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Cancun Collection', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Antioxidant', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 4.6 x 1 inches; 14.39 Ounces', 'UPC': '659436986640'} This Cancun Collection Cacao Bronzer is a fabulous alternative to getting a natural suntan from a tanning bed or from the sun due to harmful UV rays. It is also a great alternative if you do not like using self-tanners that can smell. This applies easily and blends with all skin tones. I have fair skin, but this even works on my skin color too. The bronzer blurs imperfections and stays on until you shower with soap! I recommend this product! See my pictures for more information. Great, natural looking bronzer! MD Complete Bright & Healthy Citrus-C Refresh Retinol + Vitamin C Multitasking Treatment MD Complete by Dr. Brian Zelickson {'Brand': 'MD Complete by Dr. Brian Zelickson', 'Scent': 'Citrus', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1.25 x 4.5 inches; 2.26 Ounces', 'UPC': '850458005719'} This MD Complete Bright & Healthy serum has all the ingredients recommended to treat fine lines, wrinkles and dull texture (Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Vitamin B, Retinol and Omega-3). However, I did not find this to be moisturizing at all and it actually dried my skin out - making my fine lines and wrinkles more noticeable. The product indicates this product is great for someone in their 20’s or 30’s - maybe that’s true, but this is not an effective product for someone 40+ dealing with aging skin. I cannot recommend this product for aging skin - maybe it’s effective for younger skin to prevent aging 🤷🏼‍♀️ - but it is not restorative if you have aging skin. Not recommended for aging skin 2-Pack Puretize 16.9 Oz Hand Sanitizing Gel w/Pump Tops - Extra Strength 70% Ethyl Alcohol - Moisturizing Formula with Aloe Vera, Vitamin E & Botanical Extracts - Quick Drying Formula Pure Daily Care {'Brand': 'Pure Daily Care', 'Unit Count': '33.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 6.5 x 4.5 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '810016711360'} This Puretize I stand hand sanitizer contains 70% ethyl alcohol and is free of dyes and strong perfumes. It has a bit of an alcohol or medicine sent but it is not overpowering. See my picture for a list of ingredients. Even though it is 70% alcohol it did not leave my skin feeling dried out. I think this is a great value for two containers it would be great to use in an office, church, school, or even at home! Overall, I like this product and recommend it! Keeps germs away!!! Sunsonic Electric Razor, Rechargeable Electric Shaver with Pop Up Beard Trimmer, Type-C USB Mens Electric Razor. MDDM {'Brand': 'MDDM', 'Special Feature': 'Rechargeable,Cordless', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Head Type': 'Rotary', 'Package Dimensions': '7.36 x 3.82 x 2.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '738629925151', 'Manufacturer': 'MDDM'} [[VIDEOID:f269f4bbb908ea03a9ffb408f24f4cd3]] This Sunsonic electric shaver for men is simple to use. It comes fully charged. To recharge it, you simply plug the cord into a usb charger and into the shaver. It does not provide a very close shave though. If you prefer a close shave, this may not be the best option for you.

If you are looking for an inexpensive electric shaver to keep in your car or in your office for emergencies, or if you are looking for one to travel with, this is a good option. The shaver also comes with a pop-up trimmer. Simply push a button on the back of the shaver and a trimmer pops up so that you can shave your neck and around ears. See my video for additional details. Good emergency backup saver - no close shave VILLAGE11FACTORY Cica Cream, Centella Soothing and Repairing Cream for Dry and Irritated Skin, Moisturizer, Anti-Wrinkles, Lightweight, Relieves Irritated Skin, Fragrance Free, Dermatologically Tested, 1.69 fl oz 50ml VILLAGE11FACTORY {'Brand': 'VILLAGE11FACTORY', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'hyaluronic_acid', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 1.97 x 1.46 inches; 2.47 Ounces'} This Derma Clear B5 Cica Cream is not oily/greasy at all. It makes my skin feel incredibly hydrating and makes my skin so very soft. It’s unclear from the packaging if this product is specifically designed to use on your face or all over. I’ve used it on my hands, elbows, and on dry spots all over my body and was pleasantly surprised at how well it worked. I didn’t notice any scent when using the lotion. My only reason for taking a star away from the rating is because of the cost of this product. You only get 1.69 fluid ounces of product, so it’s not a great value. However, I do think the product is effective! Very moisturizing and soften skins
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** 
  - Favors light-weight, efficient grooming tools emphasizing ease of use and practicality.
  - Prioritizes functionality in products, with a focus on smoothing, straightening, and shaving.
  - Selects brushes designed to minimize tangling, valuing versatility in personal care items.
  - Interested in skincare that delivers effective results without harmful chemicals, particularly elements that assist in hydration and repair.
  - Displays a preference for practical personal care items, such as moisturizing hand sanitizers.
  
- **Skincare Focus:** 
  - Demonstrates a growing focus on skin health, hydration, and anti-aging efficacy, seeking fragrance-free products that are dermatologically tested and provide soothing benefits.
  - Appreciates products that are hydrating and lightweight, specifically for addressing dry and irritated skin.

- **Experience with Products:**
  - Generally satisfied with purchases, maintaining a positive average rating.
  - Values the balance between product efficacy and individual skin needs, favoring natural finishes and simplicity in application.
  
- **Overall Trends:**
  - Values efficiency and usability in personal grooming, seeking quick, effective solutions that enhance natural beauty with minimal effort.
  - Exhibits concern for product effectiveness, emphasizing hydrating formulations that address aging skin and irritation concerns.
  - Recent experiences indicate a preference for practical options that prioritize immediate skin benefits, even if they come at a higher price point.
